channel.title: Differentiator object
channel.description: HI I'm looking for a differentiator object WIKI: a passive differentiator circuit can be made using a simple first-order high-pass filter, with the cut-off frequency set to be **far above the highest frequency** in the signal. I'm not a code programmer thanks

item.title: Differentiator object
item.dc:creator: @Sputnki Filippo Tamagnini
item.description:
@Sputnki wrote:

filter/delta
It outputs the difference between current and previous sample
